alphabet¶

Contains the alphabet used by recognition.

Author: Marek Dohnal

Date: 17/03/2023

class alphabet.Alphabet(value)¶

Bases: Enum

The set of elements in the input grid. The values represent grayscale colors for easy debugging.

EMPTY = 255¶
FILL = 150¶
FILL_BEGIN = 100¶
IMG_BORDER = 200¶
TILE_BORDER = 0¶
